pages.text: 26|160|los-ui baegseongdo seonjijadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|161|geudeul-ui hyeongje los-i geudeul-egemalhaessdeola neohuineun hananim-i dulyeobji anhneunyo
26|162|naneun neohuileul wihan mid-eum-ui seonjijala
26|163|hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|164|geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
26|165|neohuineun ujuui modeun pijomul gaundeseo namseong-egeman jeobgeunhalyeo ha neunyo
26|166|hananimkkeseo neohuileul wihae changjohasin neohui baeujadeul-eul beolyeo du lyeo haneunyo sillo neohuineun hangyeleul neom eoseon baegseongdeul-ila
26|167|geudeul-i daedabhagil los-iyeo nega dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon neoneun chubang danghaneunja jung-e issge doelila
26|168|geuga daedabhadoe sillo naneun neohuiui haeng-wileul jung-ohanola
26|169|juyeo jeowa jeoui gajog-eul geu deul-i haenghaneun geos-eulobuteo guhayeo jusoseo
26|170|geulihayeo hananim-eun geuwa geuui gajog moduleul guwonhago
26|171|dwie nam-aissdeon neulg-eun han yeo ingwa
26|172|daleun jadeul-eul myeolmangke haessnola
26|173|geudeul oee dol ubag-eul peobu eoss-euni i dol ubag-eun gyeong-goleul geoyeog han baegseong-ege naelyeojin geos-ila
26|174|sillo i an-eneun hanaui ye jeung-i iss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hayeossdeola
26|175|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhanola
26|176|mediyan-ui baegseongdeuldo seonji jadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|177|syuaibeuga geudeul-ege mal haessdeola hananim-i dulyeobji anhneunyo
26|178|naneun sillo neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|179|hananim-eul dulyeowohago na-e ge sunjonghala
26|180|geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
26|181|jeoul-eul gongjeonghage hayeo bujeong eulo tain-ege sonsil-eul kkichiji malla
26|182|gyunhyeong-i doedolog mugeleul dalla
26|183|salam-ui jeongdanghan gwonlileul bolyu haji malmyeo jisang-e haeag-eul peotteuli ji malla
